text: [Music]
my name is James Ock I'm the founder and
CEO at Cloud Advantage Cloud Advantage
is a boutique Cloud consulting company
we're entirely focused on enabling
companies in the cloud we look at the
cost of ownership of their existing
infrastructure um and try to build a
model that would uh make sense for the
cloud I worked as a developer in Silicon
Valley for 5 years and at the end of
that time around 2007 started using the
platform at that point and and it was
really a dream come true as a developer
to be able to just provision resources
on demand in 2010 decided to start Cloud
Advantage around that real value
proposition of AWS and of the cloud
offerings that were there one of the
ways we are able to help customers is to
give them the agility to start new new
product s in a much more uh lowrisk and
flexible way we work with everything
from uh software startups whether it's a
very small footprint but they need that
uh low Opex model the Amazon web
services provides and in the Enterprise
space they very often have new projects
that they can use the cloud for in a in
a far more cost effective and agile way
for us we think it's very much about
cost reduction and business flexibility
reducing that complexity out of the
business one of the things things that
AWS enables us to do for our customers
or with our customers is this ability to
undertake new projects that are very low
risk Point uh we have a customer at the
moment that's just spent a quar of a
million dollars on on new kit uh late
last year and that kit has to be racked
and put into the data center and the and
been sitting there unused for the last 5
months because the project hasn't
managed to get the wheels turning yet
you're not sure how you're going to use
resources but you want to be able to get
them
uh ramped up quickly and On Demand um
and be able to scale them up and down
and so the risk now is much lower
they're able to incrementally start up
um resources and and Shrink them down
and to change them and throw away old
resources where they can decide to
implement a solution in a completely
different way uh than they were able to
do in the past another interesting uh
case of ours is we've got a customer in
the UK that are using red shift at the
moment uh in a proof of concept they
currently run a business that's um data
Centric and requires massive aggregation
on on a really large data set in the
past a company that size just wouldn't
have access to a product like red shift
and we're really s excited about that
